tool.name: GEMINI @BINARY@
tool.command:
gemini @BINARY@
--in "${in}"
#set $multiline_sql_expr = $gt_filter #set $cmdln_param = "--gt-filter" @MULTILN_SQL_EXPR_TO_CMDLN@
#set $multiline_sql_expr = $sample_filter #set $cmdln_param = "--sample-filter" @MULTILN_SQL_EXPR_TO_CMDLN@
$show_samples $show_families $family_wise $header $dgidb #if $region.strip(): --region "${region}" #end if #if int($min_kindreds) > 0: --min-kindreds $min_kindreds #end if ##--format FORMAT Format of output (JSON, TPED or default) # we will take default for the time being ## --sample-delim STRING The delimiter to be used with the --show-samples option.
#set $multiline_sql_expr = $q #set $cmdln_param = "-q" @MULTILN_SQL_EXPR_TO_CMDLN@
"${ infile }" > "${ outfile }"

param.name: q
param.label: The query to be issued to the database

param.name: gt_filter
param.label: Restrictions to apply to genotype values

param.name: sample_filter
param.label: SQL filter to use to filter the sample table

param.name: show_samples
param.label: Add a column of all sample names with a variant to each variant

param.name: show_families
param.label: Add a column listing all of the families with a variant to each variant

param.name: family_wise
param.label: Perform the sample-filter on a family-wise basis

param.name: dgidb
param.label: Request drug-gene interaction info from DGIdb

param.name: in
param.label: A variant must be in either all, none or any samples passing the sample-query filter
param.option: Return a variant if all samples matching the query have the variant. (all)
Return a variant if the variant does not appear in any of the matching samples. (none)
Return all of the variant which are in all of the matching samples and not in any of the non-matching samples. (any)
Return a variant if the variant is only in the matching samples and not in any of the non-matching samples. (only)

tool.help:
**What it does**
The real power in the GEMINI framework lies in the fact that all of your genetic variants have been stored in a convenient database in the context of a wealth of genome annotations that facilitate variant interpretation.
